name: AVPlayerLooper.Status
desc: Status constants that indicate whether a looper can successfully perform looping playback.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: The looper is ready to perform looping playback.

items.name: case failed
items.desc: The looper isn’t able to perform looping playback due to an error.

items.name: case cancelled
items.desc: The app canceled looping on the player.
